name: Carrot Ninja
description:
Play as a ninja rabbit and eat as many carrots as possible while sneaking around the pesky hunters!

Use WASD to control movement, Mouse for Camera rotation and SPACE to Jump.

Carrot pickups are spawned randomly, so check spots you already visited before. Try to collect as many points in 3 minutes without getting shot by the hunters.

code repo: https://gitlab.com/radonthetyrant/gdl-gamejam-jan-18/
